website_summaries.verdict: Excellent suction power and a fantastic selection of attachments make this a great vacuum for those with lots of hard-to-reach spaces.
pros: The Dash packs an impressive 12 amps of power into a lightweight, maneuverable frame
A variety of extensions and attachments makes this model useful for cleaning high or tight spots, especially the easy-to-use and effective dust floor tool
The foot-controlled power switch for the roller provides additional control
cons: The occasional clog may require removing the bottom of the unit to clear

customer_reviews.title: no stars!!
customer_reviews.text: This item malfunctioned 7 months after I received it! The motor went bad, won't buy another Dirt Devil again!!!! Couldn't get a phone number to call, for either service or replacement. Previously I wrote a good review, but I was mistaken....bad vacuum cleaner!!! Second review: I finally had to throw this vacuum cleaner away. The handle broke first time it was used, and the belt broke a few months later, had to replace it. Finally the motor burned up and had to throw the whole thing away. Won't but from Dirt Devil again.
customer_reviews.author: Eddie

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Had this vacuum exactly a year. Motor gone and had to order a new vacuum. Frustrating as this replaced a 15 year old vacuum that still worked, I just wanted something more light weight. Worked fairly well while it lasted. Definitely a low quality vacuum
customer_reviews.author: Amber Hatton

customer_reviews.title: Very Dissapointed!!!
customer_reviews.text: I am very disappointed in this vacuum. I read all the reviews and it took me about a month before finally deciding on this one. Within the first month the belt popped off. With the help of YouTube I was able to fix that. Then about another month later the suction just stopped. So I've had a vacuum that just doesn't work sitting in my closet. I finally looked and cleaned all clogs and it still isn't working. I do not recommend this product. It's been more hassle than it's worth and now I need to find a new vacuum again so I can stop borrowing my mother in laws!
customer_reviews.author: Jenny Sheffield

customer_reviews.title: Not a good but
customer_reviews.text: 3 months after purchase, the unit hose broke. About 4 months after that, the motor started reving extremely high to the point where we couldn’t use it because it was too loud and sounded as if it was going to explode. I would not recommend
customer_reviews.author: JABARI O MYLES

customer_reviews.title: Update!!!!  No longer works
customer_reviews.text: I've had this vacuum for a little over a year and it still works like a champ. I am extremely pleased with my purchase. Update...I was using it as normal and all of a sudden it just cut off. I tried different outlets and it won't power on. Was once happy...now I am disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia Woo

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: this replaced my previous dirt devil and gets the job done. the price was cheaper than my first one.
customer_reviews.author: Retired and Busy

customer_reviews.title: Beware...
customer_reviews.text: Two concerns: it's weight makes it difficult to push and pull; the costs of replacing filters is expensive, so I think I'm just going to buy a new vacuum (thoroughly researching it) after a year of use! Over all it sucks good, getting the job done! Unless anyone has recommendations on where to get filters cheaper?
customer_reviews.author: Rosemary Sullivan

customer_reviews.title: Not for hard floors.
customer_reviews.text: I was specifically looking for one that has on on/off switch for the roller brush, which this one has. It works fine on carpet. it doesn't work at all on hard floor, there is little to no suction. I have to use the wand for hard floors which is a pain. I am very disappointed and i will be replacing this vacuum soon.
customer_reviews.author: MI Mom

customer_reviews.title: Terrible vacuum
customer_reviews.text: the worst vacuum I have ever owned. It keeps getting clogs in the hose from the roller to the bag. To clear the clog you have to completely take the bottom off, which is not easy. 9 screws and belt comes off. and the clog is really hard to clear. Sounds like an airplane, too loud. I just bought this in October 2016 .
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: You will be disappointed in this machine.
customer_reviews.text: Piece of garbage. I kept it for about 7 months and it was trouble from the start. It finally crocked out and had to go out and buy a new vacuum I got a Shark this time hopefully it will do me a better turn. It lacked suction was trouble to clean and like I said it finally broke all together what a mess do not buy this item you will be disappointed!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: ... for the last 15+ years and feel they're a great value for the money
customer_reviews.text: I've had dirt devils for the last 15+ years and feel they're a great value for the money. This one has lots of suction & is very easy to handle. It's about 10# lighter than last model but still 12 amp motor. I'd definitely recommend this to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Gma

customer_reviews.title: Well, that sucks...
customer_reviews.text: They had a great idea when they created this model, but they should have worked out all the quirks first. The handle/wand does not stay in when trying to vacuum. It's the most frustrating thing in the world! To top it off, the wand (when used for floors with their fancy attachment, sucks (not in a good way)... Was really looking forward to my new purchase, but am super disappointed now. Maybe next time Dirt Devil, maybe next time.
customer_reviews.author: Geena

customer_reviews.title: Cheap. And cheap. Do not buy if you have pets.
customer_reviews.text: Pros: easy to assemble. Sleek design. Good accessories. Easy and good settings for rug height, and hardwood to carpet switching. Easy to maneuver. Cons: super stupid to clean and empty canister. Clogs easily and often (every other use) Simple to unclog, but super annoying to take apart every freaking time it clogs. Do not use if you have pets. Maybe only good for houses with central heating and air conditioning, no children, no dust and no pets.
customer_reviews.author: Zoe Wisley

customer_reviews.title: I love it
customer_reviews.text: This vacuum cleaner is the beast. You can see all the dirt it is pulling up. You can switch from vacuuming the floor to using the extension within seconds. I love it
customer_reviews.author: D Jenrette

customer_reviews.title: ... time to try this out yet but I was pleased with how lightweight and easy to use it was
customer_reviews.text: haven't had to much time to try this out yet but I was pleased with how lightweight and easy to use it was.
customer_reviews.author: lillie morrisson

customer_reviews.title: This thing sucks!
customer_reviews.text: Has some great power and smaller than expected. The attachments are perfect for what I need and the overall quality is superb.
customer_reviews.author: smitty39

customer_reviews.title: I own a commercial cleaning company and people are pretty abusive. This works
customer_reviews.text: I own a commercial cleaning company and people are pretty abusive. This works, and, for the price,I can buy new ones for nearly the same price as repairs on more expensive cleaners. Very satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Hugh Ruic

customer_reviews.title: Glad I bought Asurion insurance
customer_reviews.text: Glad I bought Asurion insurance. Had to submit a claim as this didn't work directly out of the box well and died within two weeks.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: worked good for about a year or so then motor went bad returned for insurance refund
customer_reviews.author: steven wells

customer_reviews.title: Bang for the buck is definitely here!!  Lightweight and accessories rock!
customer_reviews.text: Give credit where it's due! Lightweight and smaller than my last one but it's big on cleaning, love the detachable wand as you can dust high and low without fighting with it or breaking your back. I have a German Shepherd that sheds constantly and wow it even got my black based area rugs hair free!!
customer_reviews.author: Mike Snyder

customer_reviews.title: Cheaply Made
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this Dirt Devil Vacuum in July of 2016 and already the hose has come apart. In my opinion it is cheaply made. I will not buy another one. Also it has poor suction.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I love it! I have hard wood floors and it ...
customer_reviews.text: I love it! I have hard wood floors and it picks up everything! Quiet too! Light weight and powerful!
customer_reviews.author: Annette Clements

customer_reviews.title: I love it!
customer_reviews.text: Picks up so much dust and dirt. I love it!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: KW in Alaska

customer_reviews.title: Love it It's pick up more than my other vacuum
customer_reviews.text: Love it It's pick up more than my other vacuum cleaner
customer_reviews.author: Steven Straman

customer_reviews.title: Light and easy to use
customer_reviews.text: I love this vacuum cleaner, it is very light and it cleans the carpet and floors very well.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This vacuum is great! I love the "Wand" function
customer_reviews.text: This vacuum is great! I love the "Wand" function, it's so great for cleaning the walls when they get dusty.....Great product!
customer_reviews.author: Bonnie Jean Tayson

customer_reviews.title: Happy decision!
customer_reviews.text: I did so much reading before buying another vacuum till I felt cross eyed. I am very happy I did. Did not spend a lot of money and this product works great!
customer_reviews.author: j.j.2365

customer_reviews.title: The vacuum is good if it works
customer_reviews.text: The vacuum is good if it works.. in less than six months i have had to change the belt twice..and the belts are expensive and hard to find.. i have been using my old vacuum more than the new one..
customer_reviews.author: marilyn smith

customer_reviews.title: Great suction and convenient to be able to switch to ...
customer_reviews.text: Great suction and convenient to be able to switch to an almost canister vacuum. Only flaw is that there should be a separate handle for the body when you are using the hose detachment.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph Lan

customer_reviews.title: Great vacuum
customer_reviews.text: I love this vacuum! Assembly was easy and only required a screw driver. The vacuum has clogged but it is easy to take apart and put back together. The vacuum does clean a lot deeper than our last one.
customer_reviews.author: Heather Arnold

customer_reviews.title: nothing like a Dyson
customer_reviews.text: Its ok, nothing like a Dyson. It does the job, but gets very warn. Also it feels cheap.
customer_reviews.author: melissa shaw

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Amazing vacuum! Works great on both carpet and linoleum! Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth Austin

customer_reviews.title: Works great! Powerful and lightweight
customer_reviews.text: Works great! Powerful and lightweight. However, cleaning it and putting it back together can be a bit of a challenge.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Tisdel

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: i was hoping it was vacuum the hardwood floor better
customer_reviews.author: Julie Stringer

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Second time around perfect things happen but I'm glad everything is perfect
customer_reviews.author: Alisann Durham

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: i wanted tha dust mop and tha pet tool....other than that works fine
customer_reviews.author: james howard

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: I had it 3 weeks and it fell a part
customer_reviews.author: jerry parker

customer_reviews.title: rug perfect, wood floor or laminate 0 of 10
customer_reviews.text: rug perfect , wood floor or laminate 0 of 10
customer_reviews.author: Johan Sanchez

customer_reviews.title: I have been a great fan of Dirt Devils for about 20- 25 years
customer_reviews.text: I have been a great fan of Dirt Devils for about 20- 25 years. This one is awful! We have had it about a year and the wand has little or no suction. After a few minutes it over heated and would not work for about an hour. We bought a Dysan the last time and didn't like it either so we switched back to Dirt Devil. We don't know where to go from here. It is very disappointing when you like a product and newer version disappoint you.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Sorry but the vacuum dont pick up the dirty good. Very hard yo use
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: is not working anymore and I just buy 2 weeks ago
customer_reviews.author: elizabeth

customer_reviews.title: opened box
customer_reviews.text: I just received the box but see double tape on both side of box, it look like was opened before, not sure yet it's new or used.
customer_reviews.author: Chi Wai Man

customer_reviews.title: Great little vacuum
customer_reviews.text: This is an awesome vacuum cleaner. Much lighter and just as powerful as a Dyson at 1/4 the price. Plus, it offers an array of useful accessories including a dust mop attachment that's great on hardwood and linoleum floors. It's lighter than many of the similar units out there too. Easy to empty and maintain, this vacuum cleaner works great for floors, cars, ceiling and wall fixtures. I'm really happy I bought it. Best yet, my wife likes it which is good because when mama ain't happy, ain't nobody happy!
customer_reviews.author: bk

customer_reviews.title: Good for carpet. Not durable for attachment use.
customer_reviews.text: Loved the product at first. However, the hose doesn’t allow the “wand” part to move easily. There’s no easy way to steer the base whennusing it as a wand. The hose ripped out after four uses. The base’s rotating brushes don’t always rotate when the lever is in the on position. I love the cord release. The handle is easy to hold. Cord is long, so helpful. Unfortunately now I need to buy. New vac as this lasted four uses on my hardwood.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great vacuum.
customer_reviews.text: Sucks stuff up very well. It cleaned my carpets better than my previous vacuum and picks up every bit of pet hair I can see. And yes, I get down on my hands and knees to do close-up inspections before and after. Have had it nearly a year and it's still going strong. My first Dirt Devil is still sucking after 12 years.
customer_reviews.author: Wlinc

customer_reviews.title: but not as good as my previous dirt devil
customer_reviews.text: I had an old Dirt Devil Scorpion that lasted 12 years, with only a couple of belt and filter changes. Until one of its wheels broke off. As replacement decided to stick with the brand. This vacuum felt light with a cheap plasticy feeling. It did the job, but not as good as my previous dirt devil. Within a couple of days, the belt broke. Replaced it and it is working, but....I was not really satisfied as far as the quality and performance is concerned. I will run it until something breaks that I can't fix, but would I buy it again? Probably not.
customer_reviews.author: Tik

customer_reviews.title: waste of time and money
customer_reviews.text: waste of time and money. IT can only be used for the smallest and simplest of jobs. Forget the dust wand. It keeps falling offand the handle release as well as activator for the roller brush is very inconvenient. Just put some more electrical tape on my two other Dirst devils and put the new one in the corner.
customer_reviews.author: Albert C. Korhonen

customer_reviews.title: Awesome and durable.
customer_reviews.text: Love this vacuum had one lost the top piece ordered another right away. Strong suction had one issues hose came unglued. Easy fix some glue screw back in. I was extending handle to far. Ooooops
customer_reviews.author: Brandon

customer_reviews.title: Loved it....till it stopped working 6 months in.
customer_reviews.text: I loved this vacuum for the first 5-6 months it worked. Today the Cleaning wand part stop working, which is the whole reason I even got this vacuum. I have a studio apartment. So it's not like it's doing a lot of work. Now it's just a clunky normal vacuum. Very disappointing. Emailed Dirt Devil today. Will change review based on how the fixing process goes
customer_reviews.author: Maria T.

customer_reviews.title: Great vacuum
customer_reviews.text: Love this vacuum. Very easy to assemble and use. The hose attachment is great for the ceiling and corners on the floor. It maneuvers easily and it's easy to clean the canister. I would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Lizotr

customer_reviews.title: Handling
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to handle ,no problems putting it together.. and it arrived on time.
customer_reviews.author: Helen McFarland

customer_reviews.title: POWERFUL, GOOD VALUE
customer_reviews.text: POWERFUL, GOOD VALUE This is my third Dirt Devil (second of this exact model). PROS: * 12 amp powerful vacuum * 3 year warranty * Hand hose works great CONS: * Non yet Powerful, does a good job, better built than other DDs I've had. GOOD VALUE! Sweeper/swiffer thing seems useless to me.
customer_reviews.author: Jason Madruga

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy, good suction
customer_reviews.text: Mostly used for area rugs and getting in the nooks and corners. Sturdy, good suction, nice little features. Not a big fan of how the bin gets emptied, but hardly a real concern. Great value.
customer_reviews.author: captainRC

customer_reviews.title: Not bad. But not great. Great budget vacuum.
customer_reviews.text: Alittle loud and not quite the vacuum power i would want. But it does the job and the hard floor hose attachment is very nice. Will upgrade to something more powerful later. Will likely keep floor attachment for future vacuum.
customer_reviews.author: B. Denman

customer_reviews.title: GREAT PRODUCT!!!
customer_reviews.text: I only buy Dirt Devils....This is SUCH a great product...don't listen to the negative reviews because it is not true at all. Easy to put together and use. Light weight and quiet vacuum.
customer_reviews.author: Liz

customer_reviews.title: Best. Vacuum. EVER.
customer_reviews.text: I’ve never been more excited to get a vacuum! I’m in an all carpet apartment with a Sheppard mix and I was drowning in her shedded fur... but not anymore! This vacuum picked it all up no problem. I love it so much!
customer_reviews.author: Winnie Hefner

customer_reviews.title: great product.
customer_reviews.text: I have 3 dogs and hard wood floors and this product keeps up with them just fine. I love the mop attachment and easy to empty container. Very strong suction and compact design are all great values.
customer_reviews.author: Steve K.

customer_reviews.title: It's a Dirt Devil!
customer_reviews.text: This vacuum performs fantastic. The other positive reviews are spot on!
customer_reviews.author: Jane M. Proulx

customer_reviews.title: Dirt Devil have such great suction, they blew my brother's Dyson away
customer_reviews.text: Dirt Devil have such great suction, they blew my brother's Dyson away. This one with the floor attachment is WONDERFUL! Attacements are easy to use, no disconnesting and reconnecting hoses, just lift out the handle and ur ready to go.
customer_reviews.author: Godley

customer_reviews.title: DONT BUY! died within 3 months
customer_reviews.text: great quality and price, easy delivery. UPDATE: Vacuum has died within 3 months of normal use. We only have area rugs and hardwood floors. Sorry, do not buy this vacuum!
customer_reviews.author: Eric H.

customer_reviews.title: Total Crap. Buy a Shark instead.
customer_reviews.text: Completely fell apart after less than 4 months. Would give zero stars if possible. Waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: Nunof Yerbiznes

customer_reviews.title: I just wish it had an adapter that angled into ...
customer_reviews.text: I just wish it had an adapter that angled into corners. The cheaper model I had before this did (unfortunately the part was not compatible​ with this one).
customer_reviews.author: Layla

customer_reviews.title: Could be the best vacuum cleaner I've ever had
customer_reviews.text: Could be the best vacuum cleaner I've ever had. Cleans like a a dream. Easy to put together. If it had a rewind power cord I'd be in love. The only bad thing I can say about it is, its a little noisy then most but not too bad.
customer_reviews.author: Robert E. Gray

customer_reviews.title: not the best vaccuum.
customer_reviews.text: The hose pulls loss as I vaccuum, It does an ok job, not the best vaccuum.
customer_reviews.author: Anne M Barkman

customer_reviews.title: It sucks
customer_reviews.text: Good buy, plenty of power. It's also kinda neat that the hard floor attachment can't suck up anything big enough to screw up the vacuum and the handle has about ten feet of total reach.
customer_reviews.author: Colin

customer_reviews.title: Worked great for six months.
customer_reviews.text: All the buttons and switches have already broken off. The hose pulled off the base. I am now shopping for a completely different brand.
customer_reviews.author: K. Moore

customer_reviews.title: Belts break often
customer_reviews.text: I have had this vacuum for less than 3 months and the belt has been replaced twice. The only.good thing about it is the dust mop feature
customer_reviews.author: Sandy B.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent vacuum but it is hard to recline the vacuum ...
customer_reviews.text: Excellent vacuum but it is hard to recline the vacuum on the left. The other issue is the wheel fell off and it was used twice. A bit frustrating trying to figure out how to reattach it. Now back to no vacuum until this gets sorted out.
customer_reviews.author: Mo

customer_reviews.title: 0 stars
customer_reviews.text: Bought in December. Used in January. Officially crapped out in March. SMH.

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars

customer_reviews.title: One Star

customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: I love it! It's easy to maneuver and not heavy
customer_reviews.text: Bought this to replace my broken Dirt Devil, I love it! It's easy to maneuver and not heavy, picks up everything it needs to.
customer_reviews.author: William M. Mccarter

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic for my hardwood & laminate floors! The special dust mop attachment is awesome!
customer_reviews.author: thesewinlady

customer_reviews.title: I bought one of those ridiculously priced cordless animal Dysons and it was useless. My housekeeper would not use it
customer_reviews.text: I used to buy Dyson, but their quality has really hit the skids. I bought one of those ridiculously priced cordless animal Dysons and it was useless. My housekeeper would not use it. This machine is a workhorse and made with the same crappy plastic as the Dyson.
customer_reviews.author: scott reed

customer_reviews.title: this is a very nice vacuum a lot of accessories really good suction doesn't ...
customer_reviews.text: this is a very nice vacuum a lot of accessories really good suction doesn't overheat like other vacuums without that expensive Tyson price
customer_reviews.author: SHARPE1FITNESS

customer_reviews.title: Great vacuum cleaner
customer_reviews.text: Great vacuum cleaner! Very good for picking up dog and cat hair. Great suction and very powerful ! Love It!
customer_reviews.author: LBK

customer_reviews.title: Good sturdy I have 2
customer_reviews.text: Good sturdy I have 2,000 sq foot hard wood n this does the job I need it to w all the right attachments and the power of a real vacuum, from my area rugs to the beds to the couches to the floors n even the dealing w cobwebs I'm a satisfied mom of 3 w two big dogs n this one's my friend. :)
customer_reviews.author: Allison Rogge

customer_reviews.title: Seriously the best vacuum you can buy at low cost
customer_reviews.text: Seriously the best vacuum you can buy at low cost! Dirt devil customer service is great! The vacuum itself is really easy to comprehend and use.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Durable
customer_reviews.text: Excellent, durable and extra swipe mop is a good idea.
customer_reviews.author: Yog

customer_reviews.title: Dirt Devil Dash Dual Cyclonic Bagless Upright
customer_reviews.text: This is a good machine, but not the one I was looking for. I needed something lighter to carry up the stairs and this was a bit awkward. It was easy to put together and use but I ended up sending it back since it was too awkward and heavy for me, personally, to use.
customer_reviews.author: Charlotte Matthews

customer_reviews.title: Good idea, not built very well
customer_reviews.text: The is a great vacuum concept but not built very well. I bought it specifically because we have a lot of wood floors and a dog bringing dirt in the house. When using the hose attachment its very unstable and tips over easily. Though it's still operating, after about a week the power switch lever broke off and know you have to push a button with your finger to turn it on and off.
customer_reviews.author: Marty

customer_reviews.title: Good buy for your money
customer_reviews.text: Vacumm works well. It is very light weight and I love the easy access to the wand. For the money I am very satisfied with the product.
customer_reviews.author: L Day

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic Vacuum. My house has never felt so clean ...
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic Vacuum. My house has never felt so clean before. Great suction. Very easy to use and switch from the full vac to handheld stick. Easy to maneuver.
customer_reviews.author: Merriette

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working after 6 months
customer_reviews.text: After about 6 months of use, It has stopped working. Power does not come on anymore.
customer_reviews.author: Ali Yasir

customer_reviews.title: This vacuum sucks great
customer_reviews.text: This vacuum sucks well, only reason for not giving 5 stars is because of the cord management system they've designed for this particular vac and the way you basically have to pull the dirt collection apart to "properly" empty the hopper. you don't have too but to PROPERLY empty it you do.
customer_reviews.author: Larry Read

customer_reviews.title: Buy a different brand!!
customer_reviews.text: Edited review: In the beginning I loved this vacuum, it was perfect for my multi floors. I move from carpet to laminate to tile with the push of a button. Makes cleaning so much easier. But after 5 months the multi floor tool lost most of its suction and a few days later it will not turn on. Tried calling the manufacturer and couldn't get anyone on the phone after waiting for 1 1/2 hours I gave up.
customer_reviews.author: Kim Frost

customer_reviews.title: Don't waste money. Sending back
customer_reviews.text: No suction whatsoever and makes grinding noise. It does not turn and will only produce a lot of dust/fiber. Don't waste money. Sending back.
customer_reviews.author: TL

customer_reviews.title: good concept poor pickup
customer_reviews.text: This is a very cutely made machine. The problem it is for very small jobs. 1/2 carpet and the bin needed emptying. Poor pickup bad suction. Is there a decent vacuum out there that can pick up the damn dog hair and sweep the carpet that will not break in 6 months and does not cost and arm and a leg? I am sick of trying.
customer_reviews.author: Loretta Gerage

customer_reviews.title: It got shot down very quickly and I tried to ...
customer_reviews.text: It got shot down very quickly and I tried to take it apart to fix it and I couldn't get to the dirt anyway... And I ended up throwing it away
customer_reviews.author: kenny  finger

customer_reviews.title: Dirt Devil vacuum
customer_reviews.text: The cleaner works very well, however it came missing a small screw so we were not able to use it until we found out about the missing screw which controlled the adjustment for vacuumiing. Fortunately we were able to use a screw that I had and so far it seems to be working well. I am very pleased with my purchase Harvey
customer_reviews.author: Harvey

product_meta.title: Dirt Devil Dash Dual Cyclonic Bagless Upright Vacuum with Bonus Vac+Dust Floor Tool, UD70250B - Corded,Red
product_meta.description: Strong and powerful meets quick and convenient. We built a full size vac with constant powerful suction to cut through whatever hits your floors. Then we gave it a little added kick — a Vac+Dust Hard Floor Tool that picks up heavy dirt and debris with a SWIPES microfiber pad that captures the dust. From couches to ceilings, carpet to hard floors, we’ve got you covered.
feature_bullets: Direct Path Cleaning Technology captures dirt from edge to edge with an even band of suction across the entire cleaning path
SWIPES washable microfiber pad with DirtLock Technology traps and lifts dirt and dust, capturing what disposable pads can leave behind
Dual Cyclonic Filtration cuts through any mess with constant powerful suction
On-Demand Cleaning Wand instantly switches to above-floor cleaning to put the whole-room within reach
12' Extended Reach lets you stretch from floors to ceilings and catch everything in between

specifications.Customer Reviews: 3.4 out of 5 stars212 ratings3.4 out of 5 stars
